name: Dracula Series: Part 2 - The Myth of the Vampire
name_original: Dracula Series: Part 2 - The Myth of the Vampire
description:
Dracula Series: Part 2 - The Myth of the Vampire is an adventure game developed by Tetraedge. It came out on 13-10-2010. It was published by Anuman Interactive.
Dracula Series: Part 2 - The Myth of the Vampire is available on PC.
